57.movie_plot: Two British track athletes, one a determined Jew, and the other a devout Christian, compete in the 1924 Olympics.

8.movie_plot: Jerry Lundegaard's inept crime falls apart due to his and his henchmen's bungling and the persistent police work of the quite pregnant Marge Gunderson.

301.movie_plot: Abby Quinn is eagerly awaiting childbirth but is haunted by dreams where she suffers a miscarriage. When she decides to rent a room to a mysterious stranger, she realizes a chain of events that will unleash the end of humanity.

117.movie_plot: In late 1950s New York, Tom Ripley, a young underachiever, is sent to Italy to retrieve Dickie Greenleaf, a rich and spoiled millionaire playboy. But when the errand fails, Ripley takes extreme measures.

172.movie_plot: When a kingpin threatens New York City, a group of mutated turtle warriors must emerge from the shadows to protect their home.

147.movie_name: Midnight in the Garden of Good and Evil (1997)

220.movie_plot: A barbarian warrior sets off to avenge his parents and his tribe whom were slain by an evil sorcerer and his henchmen when he was a boy.

284.movie_plot: A year after the murder of her mother, a teenage girl is terrorized by a new killer, who targets the girl and her friends by using horror films as part of a deadly game.

223.movie_plot: A quadriplegic ex-homicide detective and his female partner try to track down a serial killer who is terrorizing New York City.

160.movie_plot: An epic mosaic of interrelated characters in search of love, forgiveness, and meaning in the San Fernando Valley.

207.movie_plot: The son of a virtual world designer goes looking for his father and ends up inside the digital world that his father designed. He meets his father's corrupted creation and a unique ally who was born inside the digital world.

139.movie_plot: Secret Service agent Frank Horrigan couldn't save Kennedy, but he's determined not to let a clever assassin take out this president.

345.movie_plot: A drug kingpin is released from prison and seeks to take total control of the criminal underworld in order to give back to the community.

112.movie_plot: An attorney defends an officer on trial for ordering his troops to fire on civilians after they stormed a U.S. embassy in a third world country.

194.movie_plot: A reluctant dwarf must play a critical role in protecting a special baby from an evil queen.

76.movie_plot: A man tries to rescue a woman with a little help from his half brother.

118.movie_plot: A group of passengers struggle to survive and escape when their ocean liner completely capsizes at sea.

203.movie_plot: A substance designed to help the brain repair itself gives rise to a super-intelligent chimpanzee who leads an ape uprising.

288.movie_plot: A family's home is haunted by a host of ghosts.

339.movie_plot: Five medical students experiment with "near death" experiences, until the dark consequences of past tragedies begin to jeopardize their lives.

171.movie_plot: The IMF is shut down when it's implicated in the bombing of the Kremlin, causing Ethan Hunt and his new team to go rogue to clear their organization's name.

324.movie_plot: A man awakens from a coma to discover he has a psychic ability.

6.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope (1977)

45.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back (1980)
45.movie_plot: After the rebels are overpowered by the Empire on the ice planet Hoth, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda. His friends accept shelter from a questionable ally as Darth Vader hunts them in a plan to capture Luke.

298.movie_plot: A vulcanologist arrives at a countryside town recently named the second most desirable place to live in America, and discovers that the long dormant volcano, Dante's Peak, may wake up at any moment.

175.movie_plot: After training with his mentor, Batman begins his fight to free crime-ridden Gotham City from the corruption that Scarecrow and the League of Shadows have cast upon it.

25.movie_plot: Extreme measures are necessary to contain an epidemic of a deadly airborne virus. But how extreme, exactly?

87.movie_name: Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid (1969)
87.movie_plot: Two Western bank/train robbers flee to Bolivia when the law gets too close.

98.movie_plot: Investigating a gold magnate's smuggling, James Bond uncovers a plot to contaminate the Fort Knox gold reserve.

189.movie_plot: When love drive you Mad 2 the Max...

32.movie_plot: When his secret bride is executed for assaulting an English soldier who tried to rape her, Sir William Wallace begins a revolt against King Edward I of England.

71.movie_plot: Martin Riggs and Roger Murtaugh pursue a former LAPD officer who uses his knowledge of police procedure and policies to steal and sell confiscated guns and ammunition to local street gangs.

240.movie_plot: The story of the Newton gang, the most successful bank robbers in history, owing to their good planning and minimal violence.

166.movie_plot: Two straight men mistakenly end up on a "gays only" cruise.
